alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; Fairfield; Kershaw; Lancaster; Lexington; Newberry; Richland; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 6:29PM EDT until August 07 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Fairfield County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Lancaster County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Newberry County in central South Carolina... South central Chesterfield County in central South Carolina... Northern Lexington County in central South Carolina... East central Saluda County in central South Carolina... Northern Richland County in central South Carolina... Kershaw County in central South Carolina... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 629 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lake Wateree State Park to near Fairfield County Airport to near Ballentine to near Batesburg-Leesville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Irmo, Forest Acres, Camden, Winnsboro, St. Andrews, Dentsville, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Lake Wateree Dam, Oak Grove, Arcadia Lakes, Lugoff, Columbia International University, Liberty Hill, Harbison State Forest, Sesquicentennial State Park, Lake Carolina, and West Columbia Riverwalk. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 58 and 102. Interstate 26 between mile markers 88 and 110. Interstate 77 between mile markers 11 and 50. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Chesterfield; Fairfield; Kershaw; Lancaster; Lexington; Newberry; Richland; Saluda
